clinical_study.official_title: Tailored Internet-administrated Treatment of Anxiety Disorders - A Randomised Controlled Trial (NOVA II)

brief_summary.textblock: The purpose of this study is to determine whether tailored internet-administered cbt is a feasible treatment for anxiety disorders in clinical settings.

primary_outcome.measure: Change from baseline in Clinical Outcome in Routine Evaluation - Outcome Measure (CORE-OM)
primary_outcome.time_frame: Two weeks pre treatment (baseline), two weeks post treatment, and 12 months post treatment
primary_outcome.description: Measures anxiety and depressive symptoms. Change from baseline in anxiety and depressive symptoms expected between time frames.

secondary_outcome.measure: Change from baseline in Beck Anxiety Inventory (BAI)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Two weeks pre treatment (baseline), two weeks post treatment, 12 months post treatment
secondary_outcome.description: Measures anxiety symtoms. Change from baseline in anxiety symptoms expected between time frames.

secondary_outcome.measure: Change from baseline in Montgomery Åsberg Depression Rating Scale-Self Rated (MADRS-S)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Two weeks pre treatment (baseline), two weeks post treatment, and 12 months post treatment
secondary_outcome.description: Measures depressive symptoms. Change from baseline in depressive symptoms expected between time frames.

secondary_outcome.measure: Change from baseline in Quality of Life Inventory (QOLI)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Two weeks pre treatment (baseline), two weeks post treatment, and 12 months post treatment
secondary_outcome.description: Measures quality of life. Change from baseline in quality of life expected between time frames.

intervention.description: This intervention contains up to 6-10 text-based self-help modules in which 4 modules are fixed (the first three and the last) and the rest are "prescribed following the diagnostic telephone interview. These modules contain material on panic disorder, social phobia, stress management, assertiveness training, concentration, relaxation among other things.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- over 18 years
- fulfill the criteria for at least one anxiety syndrome
Exclusion Criteria:
- ongoing psychological treatment
- suicidal prone
- ongoing alcohol addiction
